entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 8:03 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.4°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 90 %

Wind: S 8 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with patchy frost.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
